name: file_digest
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pragmavantapi.
Tool description: Practical API for streamlined business and cloud applications.
API description: Calculates the digest/checksum for a given file by making a request to the pragmavantapi via RapidAPI.

source.description: The URL of the file for which the digest/checksum is to be calculated.

cache_key.description: An optional cache key for quicker lookup. Defaults to None.
